data: ALLERGY Meropenem Desensitization (12-Step Protocol)
Patient Care
Vital Signs
Prior to, between dose changes and 60 minutes after meropenem desensitization. Then BID as per routine care
Skin Assessment
Once, prior to meropenem desensitization
Communication Order
Minimize interruptions during meropenem desensitiziation, meropenem must be continuously infused to minimize risk of developing a reaction
Communication Order
During and after meropenem desensitization, observe for signs of allergic reaction including anaphylaxis
Patient Education
Educate patient not to miss any doses or stop meropenem unless signs or symptoms of allergic reaction occur. If a dose is missed, the desensitization protocol may need to be started again
Medications
Provider to change desensitization start date and time using the 'start' field at the top of the PowerPlan if required
None
Provider to ensure ongoing dose of meropenem is ordered after desensitization completed. Ongoing dose is not included in this PowerPlan
None
